name: Way Out
description:
"Way out" is a game that mixes elements of survival horror + maze games, the main goal is to occur the hordes of zombies as you try to find the exit of the maze.

LD Page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/way-out

License: MIT

Source code: https://github.com/LudumDare41/LD41
